=Sample Code=

Using *<font color="#336699">HORRO</font><font color="#ff9900">Rss</font>* in your project is so easy as you can see below. You only need to create a new class *RssParser* with the file or the URL where the content is and _parse_ it.
{{{
    RssParser rss = new RssParser("http://code.google.com/feeds/p/horrorss/updates/basic");
    try{
       rss.parse();
       RssChannelBean channel = rss.getChannel(); //Obtain the channel element
       RssImageBean image = rss.getImage(); //Obtain the image element
       Vector items = rss.getItems(); //Obtenemos un Vector de elementos item (RssItemBean)
    }catch(Exception e){
       //Treat the exception as you want
    }
}}}

That's all!
